author: trawick
msg: fix a dangling comma
(jorton mentioned "dangling slash" when I posted to the list;
I never saw what was dangling until after committing :) )

author: trawick
msg: Add command type APR_SHELLCMD_ENV for creating a process
which is started by the shell and which inherits the parent's
environment variables.
The immediate use for this is with Apache httpd's piped loggers,
correcting a regression since 1.3.
In general, applications starting child processes often want
the child to run with the same environment variables, so this
plugs a hole in the API.

author: jorton
msg: * Makefile.in (install): Install mkdir.sh and awk scripts into
installbuilddir so the standalone apr-util build can use them.

author: jorton
msg: Backport from HEAD:
* configure.in: Don't use POSIX semaphores or cross-process pthread
mutexes as the default inter-process locking mechanism.
* build/apr_hints.m4: Force default inter-process locking mechanism to
fcntl for Solaris, as per 1.3.
Reviewed by: Jeff Trawick

author: dreid
msg: Bring in the patch from apr-util that allows for NULL strings to be passed
into abts_str_equal.
